name: eecar
description: B2B platform for trading used electric vehicle parts

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../backend/local-server && npm install && cd ../../shared && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run docker:up" "npm run dev:local" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.generate:openapi: cd shared && npm run build && cd .. && npx tsx scripts/generate-openapi.ts
scripts.deploy: cd infrastructure && sam build && sam deploy
scripts.local:setup: npm run docker:up && sleep 5 && echo 'Local services ready!'
